urls.title: River Lea 'Rainy Days' sewer spill alerts - London Waterkeeper
urls.description: This email focuses on the Lea Valley inside the M25. It is this section of the River Lea which has the worst water quality. The two most significant sewer overflows are from Deephams sewage works in Edmonton and Mulberry Court in the Olympic Park. Deephams was upgraded recently so we need to know if it […]
